descriptor.name: name
descriptor.title: Public Descriptor
descriptor.description: This is what will appear in customer receipts, POS and campaigns

discount_code.name: discount_code
discount_code.title: (Optional) Coupon Code
discount_code.placeholder: ie MUNCHIE, (Or Leave blank to be *OPEN)
discount_code.description: Of this discount requires the submission of a code, enter code here, or leave blank to keep open (available to all sales that apply) NOTE: campaigns have an additional code used for tracking of Open discount offers.

rank.name: rank
rank.title: Rank
rank.description: Discount Rules are selected by rank.  (1 = high, 10 = low).  If rule is exclusive, highest ranked will be selected

is_exclusive.name: is_exclusive
is_exclusive.title: Is Exclusive?
is_exclusive.description: Exclusive discount rules cannot be combined with other discounts.  Since discount rules have a rank, the highest ranking exclusive one would be applied and all other applicable ones rejected

max_per_customer.name: max_per_customer
max_per_customer.title: Max uses per Customer
max_per_customer.description: Number of times discount can be used per customer

scheduled_at.name: scheduled_at
scheduled_at.title: (Optional) Scheduled Start At
scheduled_at.description: This will activate the Discount rule (if is_active is set to yes) on this date!

values.name: Equally
values.description: Discount will be applied to every line item equally

values.name: Proportionally
values.description: Discount will be applied to every line item proportionate to price

values.name: On Each Line Item
values.description: Full discount will be applied to EACH line item that applies
